name: Take the Crown!
description:
A roguelike dungeoncrawler with fast-paced sword and bow action! 

Controls: WASD + aim with mouse, RMB for bow, LMB for sword, E to interact

Music is made by Visager:

  • Menu theme: Castle Theme Visager - Castle Theme - Free Music Archive
  • Game music: Battle! Visager - Battle! [Loop] - Free Music Archive
